Type Alias# Int.SIMDMaskScalar

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
typealias SIMDMaskScalar = Int
```

### [SIMD-Supporting Types](/documentation/Swift/Int/SIMDMaskScalar#SIMD-Supporting-Types)

[`struct SIMD2Storage`](/documentation/swift/int/simd2storage)Storage for a vector of two integers.[`struct SIMD4Storage`](/documentation/swift/int/simd4storage)Storage for a vector of four integers.[`struct SIMD8Storage`](/documentation/swift/int/simd8storage)Storage for a vector of eight integers.[`struct SIMD16Storage`](/documentation/swift/int/simd16storage)Storage for a vector of 16 integers.[`struct SIMD32Storage`](/documentation/swift/int/simd32storage)Storage for a vector of 32 integers.[`struct SIMD64Storage`](/documentation/swift/int/simd64storage)Storage for a vector of 64 integers.
